articles.title: Aleksandra Lazić
articles.contents:
Aleksandra Lazic
          
          
          About
          Publications
          Blog
          CV
          Contact
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          Aleksandra Lazić
          
            
                
                  
                    CV
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    Publications
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    ORCID iD
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    Twitter
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    Contact
                  
                
              
                          
        

        
          
      
      
        
          
          About me
          I am a social psychology PhD Candidate and Research Assistant at the University of Belgrade Department of Psychology (LIRA).
          My PhD project explores how people make vaccination decisions and its implications for public communication, using online experiments and media content analysis. More broadly, I am interested in how people decide to help others and contribute to the public good.
          I co-founded and maintain LIRA’s open repository of psychological instruments in Serbian (REPOPSI).
          In my spare time, I like to draw, dabble in #SciComm, and teach myself R. I created this website with {distill} and {postcards}.
          
          
          Research interests
          Vaccination, Public Health Communication, Social Norms, Conspiracy Theories & Misinformation, Social Dilemmas, Altruism, Intergroup Relations, Open Science
          
          
          Methods
          Experiments (Lab), Online Surveys, Systematic Review (with Quantitative Synthesis), Content Analysis, Correlational Research, Economic Experiments (Games), Psychometric Methods/Scale Development
          
          
          Education
          University of Belgrade | M.A. in Psychology | 2016
          University of Belgrade | Diploma in Psychology | 2015
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Aleksandra Lazić
